data.name: Last Message
data.detailed_description:
Last message is a short atmospheric thriller / narrative / adventure game that brings you into a world overrun by infected.

You play as Jill Ripley, a survivor living alone after a tragic moment that took her family. After arriving home from a day of looking for supplies outside - you jump on your Computer to catch up with friends and family only to find an old friend has spotted you on the streets and reaches out for help.

Last Message gives you multiple people to communicate with to share pleasantries and discover the world. You do this by using an in-game operating system similar to Windows on a Computer. This computer comes with the standard operating system features such as instant messaging, emailing, web browsing and more!

The web browser lets you explore various web sites to learn more about your friends and also discover more lore of the game.

You people you will be communicating with are Willow - an old friend that helps you keep safe in these times of quarantine. May - your sister that wants nothing but to keep in contact with her only remaining family member. Olivier - the friend that spotted you nearby and needs help getting tools to repair his broken door.

While venturing for tools to assist Olivier you will be able to explore an apartment with a story to tell, encounter an unfriendly neighbor, transport items across a washing line to help a friend.

data.short_description: Last message is a short atmospheric thriller / narrative / adventure game that brings you into a world overrun by infected.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 740 (2048 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 5770 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q9300 (4 * 2500) or equivalent | AMD A10-5800K APU (4*3800) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB) or equivalent | Radeon HD 7770 (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.10 +
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2048
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Works best in 16x9
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10.12
  • Processor: 2.8 GHZ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4096
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Works best in 16x9

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

highlighted.name: Leave it better than you found it
